casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alvin Terrill FOSTER, Jr. No. 104P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 5, 2004. George E. Kelly, III, Raleigh, for Foster. G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.CApp. ___, 592 S.E.2d 259.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of March 2004 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of March 2004."

*36
